data.title: Harold Lloyd Filmography

data.text:
Researched and Compiled by Annette D’Agostino Lloyd

The following is a chronological list of the films in which Harold Lloyd appeared during his active filmmaking career, which spanned 1913-1947. Also included are the two films HL produced, and his two 1960s compilations. It is hoped that this list, which to my knowledge is the most comprehensive listing of his cinematic output, will assist present and future researchers with further work on the career of our favorite bespectacled comic. Enjoy.
